title: SpeedyPostage
author: SpeedyPostage
content: We are proud to announce SpeedyPostage is now accepting Bitcoin!We have the lowest rates in the industry for Bitcoin PostageCurrently we only offer USPS labelsAll bitcoin postage orders are processed instantly!View our pricing here: https://speedypostage.com/pricingThanks!

comments.author: SpeedyPostage
comments.body: Cheapest Bitcoin Postage available anywhere! Order Bitcoin postage now and receive your labels instantly.
